info.+content: とある魔術の禁書目録Ⅲ

The remaning members God's Right Seat try to take out Touma since his right arm is a threat to the Roman Catholic Church. Fiamma though, wants Touma's right hand for a very different reason. He want to recreate the world and needs certain magical items to achieve that goal. Those items include Index and Touma's right arm.
#1: "Kakumei Zenya (革命前夜)" by Yuka Iguchi
